participant_1.background:
I have difficulty expressing my feelings to others.
i love chocolate cake with extra frosting.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
My home videos are a source of comfort and nostalgia, and they help me to stay positive even when things are tough.
i would rather stay up late than get up early.

participant_2.background:
I would like to be reincarnated as a tree to provide food for my family and the community.
i love to laugh.
i have two older brothers.
my husband is a pastor.
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to laugh, spend time with my dog and husband, and watch movies.
Those all sound like great things to do. I love to stay up late and watch movies.
Me too! My husband is a pastor, so we don't get to do a lot of things on weekdays, but we have a lot of fun on the weekends.
I'm glad you have a lot of fun together! What do you like to watch on TV?
We love to watch comedies. We just watched "The Big Sick" and it was so funny.
I've heard good things about that movie. I'll have to check it out.
What kind of dog do you have?
We have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog ever.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and loving.
They are! Buddy is the perfect dog for our family.
I'm glad you have such a great dog.
